source_id.description: Unique identifier for the document's source

name.description: Name or title of the document

file_name.description: Name of the file containing the document

html_url.description: URL of the document in HTML format

description.description: Description or summary of the document's contents

source.description: Name of the organization or entity that created the document

language.description: Language in which the document is written

num_cells.description: Total number of cells in the document

num_code_cells.description: Number of cells containing code in the document

num_md_cells.description: Number of cells containing markdown in the document

len_md_text.description: Total length of the markdown text in the document
